content: knit to end of thumb sts turn row 1 sl1 knit to end without wrapping a stitch repeat row one 4 0 2 0 2 more times if 0 more repeat last 2 row 0 0 1 2 2 more times repeats are required for your size simply skip to the following instruction there should be 2 2 3 4 4 wrapped stitches before the marker and one after the marker next row rs use a safety pin or removable marker to mark the right side of the work before next row rs sl1 knit to end knitting wrapped continuing sl1 knit 16 20 23 28 34 sts place stitches without picking up wraps marker w+t slipping first st of every row knitwise knit 5 5 7 7 next row ws knit to end 7 row ending with a ws row next row rs sl1 knit to end slipping marker 15 17 19 21 23 garter ridges at narrower end when you come to it and knitting wrapped stitch without picking up wrap 3 1 2 1 2 garter ridges next row rs sl1 knit 5 5 4 4 7 w+t at the narrower end next row ws knit to end of thumb sts turn without wrapping a stitch *slipping first st of every row knit 7 11 7 9 7 row ending with a ws row 4 6 4 5 4 more garter next row rs sl1 knit to wrapped stitch knit stitch ridges have been added without picking up wrap knit 1 2 2 2 2 w+t next row ws knit to end of thumb sts turn next row rs sl1 knit to m slm w+t without wrapping a stitch next row ws knit to end repeat last 2 row 0 0 1 2 2 more times next row rs sl1 knit to end slipping marker when you come to it and knitting wrapped stitch next row rs sl1 knit to m knitting wrapped without picking up wrap stitch without picking up wrap slm w+t next row ws knit to end of thumb sts turn repeat from * 1 1 2 2 3 more time s without wrapping a stitch 11 13 14 16 18 garter ridges at narrower end next row rs sl1 knit to end slipping marker next row ws sl1 knit to end when you come to it and knitting wrapped stitch without picking up wrap garter stitch mitts by ysolda v1 1 4 complete thumb and resume next row rs sl1 knit to end slipping marker working across all stitches when you come to it and knitting wrapped stitch without picking up wrap 4 6 4 5 4 more garter ridges have been added at narrower end repeat from * 1 1 2 2 3 more times 25 33 32 38 39 garter ridges at narrower end slipping first st of every row knitwise knit 5 1 3 1 3 row ending with a wrong side row next row ws sl1 knit to end
